entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
